cta.title: Urashaka Kuba Umugore mu Tekinoroji?
cta.description: Iyandikishe ubu kugirango uterambe imbere mu karire kawe

hero.title: Ibyerekeye
hero.description: Gufasha abagore binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga, amashuri, no gufasha umuryango.

story.title: Inkuru Yacu
story.description1: EmpowerHerEd yavutse mu mutwe mugufi ariko ufite imbaraga: iyo abagore bafite amashuri kandi bafite imbaraga, umuryango wose urakura. Yashinzwe n'itsinda ry'abarezi, abayoborabugenewe, n'abafasha, EmpowerHerEd ikora kugirango irusheho kugabanya ikibazo cy'uburinganire mu mashuri no mu mahirwe.
story.description2: Urupapuro rwacu ni ahantu hizewe, huzuye abantu bose aho abagore n'abakobwa bashobora kwiga, guhuza, no gukura mu mashuri, mu kazi, no mu buzima bwabo.

whatWeDo.title: Ibyo Dukora
whatWeDo.description: Dutanga ibirimo by'amashuri, gahunda z'ubuyobozi, amasomo, no gufasha umwuga kugirango dufasha abagore kuri buri kazi. Kuva ku banyeshuri ba sekondari kugeza ku bakozi, turi hano kugirango dukore, dutange, no gufasha.

mission.title: Intego Yacu
mission.description: Kugabanya ikibazo cy'uburinganire mu ikoranabuhanga binyuze mu gutanga abagore ubumenyi, ibikoresho, no gufasha bakeneye kugirango bafate umwanya mu kazi.

vision.title: Icyerekezo Cyacu
vision.description: Isi aho abagore bafite umwanya ungana mu ikoranabuhanga kandi bafite amahirwe yo gukora imikino myiza.

whyItMatters.title: Kuki Bikenewe
whyItMatters.description: Nubwo hari iterambere, miliyoni z'abagore mu isi ziharira amahirwe yo kwiga no kuyobora. EmpowerHerEd irimo guhindura ibyo binyuze mu gufasha kwizera, ubushobozi, no umuryango.
whyItMatters.highlight: Hamwe, dukora ejo hazaza aho amashuri ari uburenganzira kandi si ubwishingizi ku bagore bose.

values.title: Indangamuco Zacu
values.subtitle: Aya maherezo yacu atuyobora mu byose dukora kuri EmpowerHerEd

hero.title: Inkuru Z'Intsinzi
hero.description: Menya uko EmpowerHerEd yahinduye ubuzima no gutera imbere abagore mu Rwanda.

marie.name: Marie Uwimana
marie.quote: EmpowerHerEd yampaye ubumenyi no kwizera ngo nkore umwuga wanjye wa tekinoroji. Ubufasha n'inkunga byari ngombwa cyane.
marie.story: Nyuma yo kurangiza amasomo ya kode, nafashe akazi nka mukora wa software mu kambani ya tekinoroji. Ubumenyi n'imyitozo byampaye byari ngombwa cyane mu kazi kanjye.

grace.name: Grace Mukamana
grace.quote: Porogaramu yo gutera imbere y'ubucuruzi yampaye ubumenyi bwo guhindura igitekerezo kanjye gato kikaba umucuruzi mwiza.
grace.story: Nkoresheje ubumenyi bwakuye mu masomo ya EmpowerHerEd, nashinze isosiyete yanjye ya fashion, nkora abandi bagore mu karere kanjye.

sarah.name: Sarah Niyonsenga
sarah.quote: Amasomo yo kuyobora yampaye ubumenyi bwo guhindura ubuzima bw'umuryango wanjye.
sarah.story: Nkoresheje ubumenyi bwakuye mu masomo yo kuyobora, nshinzwe gahunda zifasha abagore no gutera imbere mu karere kanjye.

claire.name: Claire Uwase
claire.quote: Porogaramu yo gusuzuma data yampaye amahirwe mashya.
claire.story: Nyuma yo kurangiza amasomo ya data, nafashe akazi mu ishami ry'ubushakashatsi, nkora gahunda zifasha abaturage.

joyce.name: Joyce Mutoni
joyce.quote: Ubumenyi bwa tekinoroji n'ubucuruzi byari ngombwa cyane kuri njye.
joyce.story: Nashinze porogaramu ya mobile ifasha aborozi kugurisha ibyabo, nkoresheje ubumenyi bwakuye mu masomo ya EmpowerHerEd.

esther.name: Esther Mukamana
esther.quote: Porogaramu ya digital yampaye ubumenyi bwo guhindura umwuga wanjye.
esther.story: Nahinduye umwuga wanjye wo kuri marketing ya digital, nfasha amasosiyete gutera imbere kuri interineti.

alice.name: Alice Uwamahoro
alice.quote: Porogaramu ya design yampaye ubumenyi bwo guhuza ubuhanga n'ubumenyi.
alice.story: Nshinzwe gahunda za design mu kambani ya tekinoroji, nkora porogaramu zifasha abaturage.

beatrice.name: Beatrice Nyirahabimana
beatrice.quote: Amasomo ya cybersecurity yampaye amahirwe yo kwinjira mu kazi nta nubwo nari nzi.
beatrice.story: Nyuma yo kurangiza amasomo, nafashe akazi mu ishami ry'ubwishingizi, nfasha gukingira amakuru y'abakiriya.

diane.name: Diane Uwase
diane.quote: Porogaramu ya tekinoroji yampaye ubumenyi bwo gukora AI.
diane.story: Nkora gahunda za AI zifasha aborozi kugera ku birebana n'ibihe, nkora impinduka mu buzima bwabo.
